## returnTemplaterScripts() function

**Signature:**

```typescript
declare function returnTemplaterScripts(): Record<string, Function>;
```
**Returns:**

Record&lt;string, Function&gt;

an object that contains all of the different scripts that can be run

## Remarks

Obsidian templater  to receive a commonjs module that exports a single function.
